channel.description: Recent content in Covid on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Steve Martin Cancels Comedy Shows Due to COVID Diagnosis
item.description: The comedian-actor had shows planned in Virginia on Friday and Saturday night with his ‘Only Murders in the Building’ co-star Martin Short.
